name: Multi-Product Inquiry - IL Auto+Home State Farm
description: Test case for multi-product bundle inquiry - tests bundle opportunity detection
input: I'm looking to bundle my auto and home insurance in Illinois. I have a 2018 Toyota Camry and own a house built in 2015. I'm 40 years old, have 2 vehicles total, and a clean driving record.

expectedRoute.rationale: State Farm offers both auto and home insurance in Illinois and provides bundle discounts.
